name: Vikram Solar Limited
description: Vikram Solar Limited is a leading renewable energy company based in India, specializing in the manufacturing of high-efficiency solar photovoltaic (PV) modules and providing EPC (engineering, procurement, and construction) services for solar power projects. Founded in 2006, Vikram Solar has established itself as a key player in the solar energy sector, contributing significantly to India's transition towards sustainable energy sources. The company offers a diverse range of solar products, including monocrystalline and polycrystalline solar panels, which are designed for optimal performance and durability. With a commitment to innovation, Vikram Solar invests in research and development to enhance its product offerings and maintain its competitive edge. The company also emphasizes sustainability in its operations, adhering to stringent environmental and safety standards. Vikram Solar's mission is to harness solar energy effectively and promote a greener planet by providing reliable and affordable solar solutions. As part of its growth strategy, Vikram Solar is expanding its international presence, collaborating with various stakeholders to enhance solar energy adoption globally.
